   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %% Originally based on Per Gustafsson's test suite.
   22: %%
   23: 
   24: -module(bs_bit_binaries_no_opt_SUITE).
   25: 
   26: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   27: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   28: 	 misc/1,horrid_match/1,test_bitstr/1,test_bit_size/1,asymmetric_tests/1,
   29: 	 big_asymmetric_tests/1,binary_to_and_from_list/1,
   30: 	 big_binary_to_and_from_list/1,send_and_receive/1,
   31: 	 send_and_receive_alot/1,append/1]).
   32: 
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   34: 
   35: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   36: 
   37: all() -> 
   38:     [misc, horrid_match, test_bitstr, test_bit_size,
   39:      asymmetric_tests, big_asymmetric_tests,
   40:      binary_to_and_from_list, big_binary_to_and_from_list,
   41:      send_and_receive, send_and_receive_alot, append].
   42: 
   43: groups() -> 
   44:     [].
   45: 
   46: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   53:     Config.
   54: 
   55: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: 
   58: 
   59: misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   60:     <<1:100>> = id(<<1:100>>),
   61:     {ok,ok} = {match(7),match(9)},
   62:     {ok,ok} = {match1(15),match1(31)},
   63:     ok.
   64: 
   65: 
   66: match(N) ->
   67:     %% Move N to a Y register to cover another instruction.
   68:     <<0:N>> = id(<<0:N>>),
   69:     <<0:N,0:1>> = id(<<0:N,0:1>>),
   70:     ok.
   71: 
   72: match1(N) ->
   73:     %% Putting the binary inside a list will force another
   74:     %% instruction to be used.
   75:     [<<42:N/little>>] = id([<<42:N/little>>]),
   76:     ok.
   77: 
   78: test_bit_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   79:     101 = bit_size(<<1:101>>),
   80:     1001 = bit_size(<<1:1001>>),
   81:     80 = bit_size(<<1:80>>),
   82:     800 = bit_size(<<1:800>>),
   83:     Bin = <<0:16#1000000>>,
   84:     BigBin = list_to_bitstring([Bin||_ <- lists:seq(1,16#10)]++[<<1:1>>]),
   85:     16#10000001 = erlang:bit_size(BigBin),
   86:     %% Only run these on computers with lots of memory
   87:     %% HugeBin = list_to_bitstring([BigBin||_ <- lists:seq(1,16#10)]++[<<1:1>>]),
   88:     %% 16#100000011 = bit_size(HugeBin), 
   89:     0 = bit_size(<<>>),
   90:     ok.
   91: 
   92: horrid_match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   93:     <<1:4,B:24/bitstring>> = <<1:4,42:24/little>>,
   94:     <<42:24/little>> = B, 
   95:     ok.
   96: 			 
   97: test_bitstr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   98:     <<1:7,B/bitstring>> = <<1:7,<<1:1,6>>/bitstring>>,
   99:     <<1:1,6>> = B,
  100:     B = <<1:1,6>>,
  101:   ok.
  102: 		      
  103: asymmetric_tests(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  104:     <<1:12>> = <<0,1:4>>,
  105:     <<0,1:4>> = <<1:12>>,
  106:     <<1:1,X/bitstring>> = <<128,255,0,0:2>>,
  107:     <<1,254,0,0:1>> = X,
  108:     X = <<1,254,0,0:1>>,
  109:     <<1:1,X1:25/bitstring>> = <<128,255,0,0:2>>,
  110:     <<1,254,0,0:1>> = X1,
  111:     X1 = <<1,254,0,0:1>>,
  112:     ok.
  113: 
  114: big_asymmetric_tests(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     <<1:875,1:12>> = <<1:875,0,1:4>>,
  116:     <<1:875,0,1:4>> = <<1:875,1:12>>,
  117:     <<1:1,X/bitstring>> = <<128,255,0,0:2,1:875>>,
  118:     <<1,254,0,0:1,1:875>> = X,
  119:     X = <<1,254,0,0:1,1:875>>,
  120:     <<1:1,X1:900/bitstring>> = <<128,255,0,0:2,1:875>>,
  121:     <<1,254,0,0:1,1:875>> = X1,
  122:     X1 = <<1,254,0,0:1,1:875>>,
  123:   ok.
  124: 
  125: binary_to_and_from_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  126:     <<1,2,3,4,1:1>> = list_to_bitstring(bitstring_to_list(<<1,2,3,4,1:1>>)),
  127:     [1,2,3,4,<<1:1>>] = bitstring_to_list(<<1,2,3,4,1:1>>),
  128:     <<1:1,1,2,3,4>> = list_to_bitstring([<<1:1>>,1,2,3,4]),
  129:     [128,129,1,130,<<0:1>>] = bitstring_to_list(<<1:1,1,2,3,4>>),
  130:     ok.
  131:  
  132: big_binary_to_and_from_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  133:     <<1:800,2,3,4,1:1>> = list_to_bitstring(bitstring_to_list(<<1:800,2,3,4,1:1>>)),
  134:     [1,2,3,4|_Rest1] = bitstring_to_list(<<1,2,3,4,1:800,1:1>>),
  135:     <<1:801,1,2,3,4>> = list_to_bitstring([<<1:801>>,1,2,3,4]),
  136:     ok.  
  137: 
  138: send_and_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  139:     Bin = <<1,2:7>>,
  140:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> receiver(Bin) end),
  141:     Pid ! {self(),<<1:7,8:5,Bin/bitstring>>},
  142:     receive
  143: 	      ok ->
  144: 		  ok
  145: 	  end.
  146: 
  147: receiver(Bin) ->	 
  148:     receive
  149: 	{Pid,<<1:7,8:5,Bin/bitstring>>} ->
  150: 	    Pid ! ok
  151:   end.
  152: 	    
  153: send_and_receive_alot(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  154:     Bin = <<1:1000001>>,
  155:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> receiver_alot(Bin) end),
  156:     spamalot(100,Bin,Pid).
  157: 
  158: spamalot(N,Bin,Pid) when N > 0 ->
  159:     Pid ! {self(),<<1:7,8:5,Bin/bitstring>>},
  160:     receive
  161: 	ok ->
  162: 	    ok
  163:     end,
  164:     spamalot(N-1,Bin,Pid);
  165: spamalot(0,_Bin,Pid) ->
  166:     Pid ! no_more,
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: receiver_alot(Bin) ->	 
  170:     receive
  171: 	{Pid,<<1:7,8:5,Bin/bitstring>>} ->
  172: 	    Pid ! ok;
  173: 	no_more -> ok
  174:     end,
  175:     receiver_alot(Bin).
  176: 
  177: append(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  178:     cs_init(),
  179:     <<(-1):256/signed-unit:8>> = cs(do_append(id(<<>>), 256*8)),
  180:     <<(-1):256/signed-unit:8>> = cs(do_append2(id(<<>>), 256*4)),
  181:     <<(-1):256/signed-unit:8>> = cs(do_append3(id(<<>>), 256*8)),
  182:     cs_end().
  183:     
  184: do_append(Bin, N) when N > 0 -> do_append(<<Bin/bits,1:1>>, N-1);
  185: do_append(Bin, 0) -> Bin.
  186: 
  187: do_append2(Bin, N) when N > 0 -> do_append2(<<Bin/binary-unit:2,3:2>>, N-1);
  188: do_append2(Bin, 0) -> Bin.
  189: 
  190: do_append3(Bin, N) when N > 0 ->
  191:     Bits = bit_size(Bin),
  192:     if
  193: 	Bits rem 2 =:= 0 ->
  194: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:2,1:1>>, N-1);
  195: 	Bits rem 3 =:= 0 ->
  196: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:3,1:1>>, N-1);
  197: 	Bits rem 4 =:= 0 ->
  198: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:4,1:1>>, N-1);
  199: 	Bits rem 5 =:= 0 ->
  200: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:5,1:1>>, N-1);
  201: 	Bits rem 6 =:= 0 ->
  202: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:6,1:1>>, N-1);
  203: 	Bits rem 7 =:= 0 ->
  204: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:7,1:1>>, N-1);
  205: 	Bits rem 8 =:= 0 ->
  206: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:8,1:1>>, N-1);
  207: 	Bits rem 9 =:= 0 ->
  208: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:9,1:1>>, N-1);
  209: 	Bits rem 10 =:= 0 ->
  210: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:10,1:1>>, N-1);
  211: 	Bits rem 11 =:= 0 ->
  212: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:11,1:1>>, N-1);
  213: 	Bits rem 12 =:= 0 ->
  214: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:12,1:1>>, N-1);
  215: 	Bits rem 13 =:= 0 ->
  216: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:13,1:1>>, N-1);
  217: 	Bits rem 14 =:= 0 ->
  218: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:14,1:1>>, N-1);
  219: 	Bits rem 15 =:= 0 ->
  220: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:15,1:1>>, N-1);
  221: 	Bits rem 16 =:= 0 ->
  222: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:16,1:1>>, N-1);
  223: 	Bits rem 17 =:= 0 ->
  224: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:17,1:1>>, N-1);
  225: 	true ->
  226: 	    do_append3(<<Bin/binary-unit:1,1:1>>, N-1)
  227:     end;
  228: do_append3(Bin, 0) -> Bin.
  229: 
  230: cs_init() ->
  231:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
  232:     ok.
  233: 
  234: cs_end() ->
  235:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
  236:     ok.
  237: 
  238: %% Verify that the allocated size is exact (rounded up to the nearest byte).
  239: cs(Bin) ->
  240:     ByteSize = byte_size(Bin),
  241:     {refc_binary,ByteSize,{binary,ByteSize},_} = 
  242: 	erts_debug:get_internal_state({binary_info,Bin}),
  243:     Bin.
  244: 
  245: id(I) -> I.
